title: Animals Vol 01 - Forest Animals MOBILE
description: Animals Vol 01 - Forest Animals Mobile is a pack of 8 game AI ready animal animations, meshes and sound fx.
longDescription: Preview: https://youtu.be/GyStfkcgm9Y Pack comes with 8 animals with realistic meshes and LODs, 2 stylized meshes for each animal, over 150 animations and sound fx. Realistic mesh has one LOD level lower detail than the "non-mobile" pack or the separate animals from GiM. Animations cover 3 locomotion speeds, 2 stand types, turns in place, hit and death animations, idle animations and attack animations (bear, fox, wolf, spider).
technicalDetails:
Scaled to Epic skeleton: No 
Rigged: Yes 
Rigged to Epic skeleton: No 
Animated: Yes 
Number of characters: 24
